name: IDEA Mouse Gestures
short_description: IDEA Mouse Gestures is an IntelliJ IDEA plugin for enabling mouse gestures in IDE. You will have a fast way to execute commands without using the keyboard, menus or toolbars. It is configurable from the IDEA's settings dialog.
